posts.content: Anyone running this set up if so any shots and feedback on how good these are ,current bus slam works narrowed but this set up is looking appealing ,any info appreciated regards Dave m.

I'm running Red9

the below link will show you the system .... its from that page onwards


viewtopic.php?f=8&t=77632&start=2820


for me the system is FAB ..... SMOOTH , POSITIVE STEERING , FULLY ADJUSTABLE SHOCKS , AND WAS EASY TO FIT


down side are you'll never be able to go super low again and this system is not narrow enough for your bus to go super low ...... I've had it down to 62" to gutter and I rubber on my inner arches so I took him back up ... his now sitting at 63 1/4 I think and its a good high and only rubs a tinny bit every now and then if i have heavy passenger and hit a big bump in road .... ( wife 9 stone so it never rubs when she is shot gun ever with a fully loaded bus )


If you need any more info just call buddy 07799714868 and I i can answer your questions i was

Mark
